system.requirements: Tier 3; Command +20,Scholastic Lore (Imperial Creed). Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect: Character can Orate to their Enemies as a Free Action after rolling initiative, they make a -20 Command Test, if successful enemies treat character as possessing Fear(1) Trait (+1 per three degrees of success, up to Fear(3)) for the remainder of the encounter.
